message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its value and potential impact on your operations, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special opportunity tailored specifically for you, considering the substantial worth ($10,000) this product holds for you. I am confident it will exceed your expectations and contribute positively to your endeavors. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.
